page.title: 09CUSTOMS & TRADITIONS.
page.content: { At Hogmanay}people celebrate the coming of the new year which is celeb- rated mid-night.Some people get drunk and have a party.Usually when you go to a party you first foot them and give them a present of a lump of coal. It is good manners to take a bottle of drink to offer to your hosts.You can kiss your sweetheart under the mistle- toe.People sing Aud Lang Syne & then stay up late enjoying themselves. {At Halloween}people wear fancy-dress and masks.People duck for apples in water.We carry turnip lanterns & go guising for money,sweets,or frubut you have to tell a joke or sing a song. {Burn's Night}is on the 25th January. People meet.They eat haggis,neeps & tatties.They read poems by Robert Burns.They wear Highland dress,drink Whisky & celebrate.Some people go to Russia on Burn's visits.
